languages.text: Стены лифтовой шахты покрыты слоем гнилостной массы, в которой заметны жуткие наросты — застывшие в ней тела людей.

traits.locale_text: Стены лифтовой шахты покрыты слоем гнилостной массы, в которой заметны жуткие наросты — застывшие в ней тела людей.

languages.text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.
languages.original_text: Стены лифтовой шахты покрыты слоем гнилостной массы, в которой заметны жуткие наросты — застывшие в ней тела людей.

traits.locale_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.
The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.
The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.
The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

languages.text: 电梯井的墙壁上沾满了腐烂的粘液，粘液里生长着令人反感的东西——那些都是包裹在粘液中的尸块。
languages.original_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

traits.locale_text: 电梯井的墙壁上沾满了腐烂的粘液，粘液里生长着令人反感的东西——那些都是包裹在粘液中的尸块。

languages.text: Las paredes del hueco del ascensor están cubiertas de un moco pútrido que engloba tumores repugnantes: los cuerpos de la gente atrapada en su interior.
languages.original_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

traits.locale_text: Las paredes del hueco del ascensor están cubiertas de un moco pútrido que engloba tumores repugnantes: los cuerpos de la gente atrapada en su interior.

languages.text: 昇降シャフトの壁は腐敗した溶解物の層で覆われ、中には人々の死体が閉じ込められていて実におぞましい造形だ。
languages.original_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

traits.locale_text: 昇降シャフトの壁は腐敗した溶解物の層で覆われ、中には人々の死体が閉じ込められていて実におぞましい造形だ。

languages.text: Die Wände des Aufzugsschachts sind mit einer Schicht fauligen Schleims bedeckt und weisen grausige Auswüchse auf – die Leichen der Personen, die dort gefangen waren.
languages.original_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

traits.locale_text: Die Wände des Aufzugsschachts sind mit einer Schicht fauligen Schleims bedeckt und weisen grausige Auswüchse auf – die Leichen der Personen, die dort gefangen waren.

languages.text: Les parois de la cage d'ascenseur sont recouvertes d'une couche de bouillie putréfiée dont émergent par endroits, telles d'immondes protubérances, les cadavres de ceux qui s'y sont fait piéger.
languages.original_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

traits.locale_text: Les parois de la cage d'ascenseur sont recouvertes d'une couche de bouillie putréfiée dont émergent par endroits, telles d'immondes protubérances, les cadavres de ceux qui s'y sont fait piéger.

languages.text: Asansör boşluğundaki duvarlar, kokuşmuş tümörlerle dolu balçık katmanlarıyla kaplanmış. İçerisinde insan parçaları var.
languages.original_text: The walls of the lift shaft are coated in a layer of putrefying goo containing revolting growths — the bodies of the people trapped within it.

traits.locale_text: Asansör boşluğundaki duvarlar kokuşmuş tümörlerle dolu balçık katmanlarıyla kaplanmış. İçerisinde insan parçaları var.
